BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! You look preoccupied, so I won't
keep you long.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's just... <sp:5:1:0>I saw sunken treasure in a
pond on the hill near <clr:0000>Ludfo's Bog<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Seems a shame to leave perfectly good
treasure chests down there.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if
there's a way to lift them out...
RainRun:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Brr!<sp:5:1:0> Rain's making me chilly. I better go
get under something.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Those <clr:0000>Skyview Towers <clr:ffff>are easy to pick
out on the horizon, huh?<sp:5:0:0> That's why they
make such good landmarks!<sp:0:4:0>Though the sky islands are grander,
of course. If ever I'm lost, I know I can
look up at them to find my way.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Is there some way to reach them?
As a consummate traveler, I'd love to
go up there just once...
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Busy day?


You know, there used to be an awful—
and I mean awful—thunderstorm raging
throughout this whole area.
It never let up...<sp:5:0:0>until recently it did.
Which is why I was able to come here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Now that it's safer, maybe I should climb
a tall tree and scope things out.
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Got a lot to do today?


When I'm traveling, I love to take in the
sight of sky islands floating overhead.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Look at that structure.<sp:5:1:0> Gotta be...<sp:5:0:0>one of
the <clr:0000>Skyview Towers<clr:ffff>, right?<sp:0:4:0>It's big, that thing! I bet it'd be easy to
spot from a distance.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Maybe I'll use it as a <clr:0000>landmark<clr:ffff> when
I'm traveling.

Always helps to have a <clr:0000>landmark<clr:ffff>. That
way, if you get mixed up, you can turn
yourself the right way around!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you get too cold, it'll sap your strength
and you won't be able to flee when you
need to. Best not to be reckless.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When I left on my journey, I used the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>as a landmark to keep
track of my direction.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But down in this valley, I can't see it,
so I'm getting all mixed up.

If I could only scale the cliffs here,<sp:5:0:0> I'd be
able to see the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>and figure
out which way to go.
Near_RainPoint_01: Will the rain ever let up?
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Painful_01>Argh! <sp:5:0:0>That's no ordinary foe!<sp:0:4:0>We can try to attack, but I don't see a
way to win this one!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you so much! If you hadn't shown
up when you did, I'd be done for!
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Busy day? At least with all the tall
trees around here, you don't have to
worry about getting lost.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Since the <clr:0000>Skyview Towers <clr:ffff>are so easy to
see from far away, they're good for
<clr:0000>keeping oriented <clr:ffff>during a long journey.
Near_GoRange_01: Just once, I wanna climb it.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Whew, that was close! <sp:5:0:0>Who taught you to
fight like that?
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>But from down here, you can't see them
at all... <sp:5:0:0>It's eerie.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If I could scale the cliffs, I'd be able to
see them and the Skyview Towers again.
Then I'd feel much better.
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0100>Here. A small token of my appreciation.<sp:5:1:0>
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, you taking a rest here too?


It's been a long journey. I figured
<clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable <clr:ffff>was a good
place to stop and catch my breath.
And with all the tall trees nearby, it was
easy to spot from far away.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Painful_01>Whew, thanks! They ambushed me out
of nowhere!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there! You taking a pit stop too?


You may be surprised to learn that before
the Upheaval, this stable was more north.

When the cold snap hit <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>, business
froze up and they had to relocate.

I'm sure it's no accident they moved in
next to a geoglyph. Good chance to make
some dough off the sightseer crowd.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! Word has it there's actually a <clr:0000>giant
monster <clr:ffff>prowling around <clr:0000>north <clr:ffff>of
the geoglyph.
So if you're passing that way, be sure to
keep an eye out.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Tired_01>I'm saved! Thanks! That would have been
tough to deal with on my own.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those poor treasure chests lying there,
unopened, in that pond on the hill near
<clr:0000>Ludfo's Bog<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish there was a way to get them out...
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I probably could have handled that on
my own.<sp:0:4:0>But thanks!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Tired_00>You...<sp:5:1:0> You saved me! <sp:5:1:0>I thought I was
done for.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thanks! I probably didn't need your help,
but you never know.
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>When I left on my journey, I used the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>as a landmark to keep
track of my direction.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If I could only scale the cliffs here, I'd be
able to get a good look at it and wouldn't
feel quite so lost.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There are lots of tall trees around here,
which make the stable easy to find from
far away.
It's always a good idea to make note of
a few landmarks as you travel. <sp:5:1:0>Do that,
and you'll never get lost.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Word has it there's a giant monster
prowling around <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> of the geoglyph.<sp:0:4:0>You take care of yourself, OK?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Travelers like us always have to be wary
of wind and rain.<sp:0:4:0>If you're not careful, the chill will sap your
strength and you won't be able to flee
when you need to.
In short, don't be reckless, or you'll get
yourself hurt.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I'm going to climb a tree and look
around, I should do it soon. Never know
when that horrible storm will kick back up.
